body_html:
Hey, guys. Here are the solutions.

mkdir ~/glibc
cd ~/glibc 

wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/glibc/glibc-2.23.tar.gz
tar zxvf glibc-2.23.tar.gz
cd glibc-2.23
mkdir build
cd build

../configure --prefix=/opt/glibc-2.23
make -j4
sudo make install

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/glibc-2.23/lib

Cannot run on CentOS with glibc 2.17

body:
Hey, guys. Here are the solutions.
```
mkdir ~/glibc
cd ~/glibc 

wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/glibc/glibc-2.23.tar.gz
tar zxvf glibc-2.23.tar.gz
cd glibc-2.23
mkdir build
cd build

../configure --prefix=/opt/glibc-2.23
make -j4
sudo make install

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/glibc-2.23/lib
```
[Cannot run on CentOS with glibc 2.17](https://github.com/mind/wheels/issues/7)
